metadata.title: RECIKA Co., Ltd. | Digital Influence, Real Change
metadata.description: Maximizing real-world asset value through blockchain technology. RECIKA supports digital transformation through Platform and Solution businesses.

hero.lead: Maximizing real-world asset value through blockchain technology.

value.title: VALUE
value.subtitle: Why Choose Us
value.technology_desc: Enterprise-grade blockchain solutions powered by our proprietary private chain, CORECIKA.
value.support_desc: End-to-end support from ideation to operation. Start your Web3 journey with confidence, no prior expertise required.
value.security_desc: Designed to meet financial-grade security standards. Robust systems built with asset safety as the top priority.
value.global_desc: Global expansion from Japan. Multilingual support and international compliance standards enable access to overseas markets.

products_section.title: PRODUCTS
products_section.subtitle: Our Products
products_section.unicask_desc: RWA platform for whisky casks. Tokenizing real assets to create new investment experiences.
products_section.ango_desc: Vacant house revitalization x Web3 hospitality x DAO. Activating local resources through ReFi.
products_section.jpnft_desc: Authorized IP registration service. Enabling rights protection and distribution of digital content.
products_section.livesola_desc: Live streaming and digital content sales platform for IP holders.
products_section.corecika_desc: Proprietary private chain and middleware. Enterprise blockchain infrastructure.

business.title: BUSINESS
business.subtitle: Our Business
business.platform_desc: Creating new value by digitizing real-world assets through our proprietary products. We operate specialized platforms including UniCask, ANGO, and JPNFT.
business.platform_features: RWA (Real World Asset Tokenization) / NFT Infrastructure / DeFi Integration
business.solution_desc: Comprehensive support for enterprise blockchain adoption. From strategy development to system implementation and operations, we provide end-to-end support for Web3 business transformation.

cta.title: Ready to Transform Your Assets?
cta.subtitle: Expand your business possibilities with blockchain technology.

philosophy.mission_text: Maximizing real-world asset value through blockchain technology, creating a future where anyone can own and share assets globally.
philosophy.vision_text: A society where individuals and businesses seamlessly connect through real assets, in a world where Web3 technology is the norm.
philosophy.ceo_message: Since our founding in 2018, we have believed in the potential of blockchain technology and have been building bridges between real-world assets and the digital world. Finding new value in everything from whisky casks to vacant houses -- that is RECIKA's challenge.
philosophy.value_innovation_desc: We continuously challenge ourselves to create new value with blockchain technology, unconstrained by existing frameworks.
philosophy.value_integrity_desc: We prioritize transparency and trust, maintaining integrity with all stakeholders.
philosophy.value_impact_desc: We bring transformation to the real world through technology, creating positive impact across society.

business_page.platform_desc: Creating new value by digitizing real-world assets through our proprietary products. We operate specialized platforms across various domains.
business_page.unicask_desc: RWA (Real World Asset) platform for whisky casks. Partnering with distilleries in Scotland and Ireland, we tokenize real whisky casks as NFTs, creating new investment experiences.
business_page.ango_desc: Vacant house revitalization x Web3 hospitality x DAO. Renovating vacant houses across Japan and revitalizing them as decentralized accommodation facilities using Web3 technology. A next-generation project activating local resources through ReFi.
business_page.jpnft_desc: Authorized IP registration and certification service. Enabling rights protection and distribution of digital content, building a safe trading environment for creators and IP holders. A project supported by METI (Ministry of Economy, Trade and Industry).
business_page.livesola_desc: Live streaming and digital content sales platform for IP holders. Artists and creators connect directly with fans, enabling new revenue models through digital content.
business_page.corecika_desc: Proprietary private chain and middleware. As an enterprise blockchain infrastructure, it achieves high-speed processing, low cost, and high security. The core technology powering all of RECIKA's products.
business_page.solution_desc: Comprehensive support for enterprise blockchain adoption. From strategy development to system implementation and operations, we provide end-to-end support for Web3 business transformation.
business_page.consulting_desc: From blockchain adoption strategy to execution planning, we provide expert advice based on extensive experience.
business_page.development_desc: Leveraging our proprietary CORECIKA platform, we design and develop blockchain systems optimized for enterprise needs.
business_page.operations_desc: From post-implementation operations to system improvements, we support business growth as a long-term partner.

company.value_address: Inspired.Lab, 6F Otemachi Building, 1-6-1 Otemachi, Chiyoda-ku, Tokyo
company.chairman_bio: Representative of Asakaze Investment Limited Partnership. A veteran of the investment industry, he focuses on the social implementation of blockchain technology and guides RECIKA's strategic direction.
company.ceo_bio: Founded RECIKA in 2018. Under the vision of fusing blockchain technology with real-world assets, he has successively launched innovative products including UniCask and ANGO.
company.access_address: Inspired.Lab, 6F Otemachi Building, 1-6-1 Otemachi, Chiyoda-ku, Tokyo

news_page.news_1_title: ANGO KAWAGUCHIKO I - Kawaguchiko Site Now Open
news_page.news_1_summary: The renovated accommodation facility 'ANGO KAWAGUCHIKO I' in the Kawaguchiko area is now open.
news_page.news_2_title: Regenerative Tourism Project Launched with Ikusaka Village, Nagano
news_page.news_2_summary: A regenerative tourism project utilizing vacant houses has been launched in collaboration with Ikusaka Village, Nagano.
news_page.news_3_title: UniCask Assets Under Management Surpass JPY 7.6 Billion
news_page.news_3_summary: Assets under management on the whisky cask RWA platform 'UniCask' have surpassed JPY 7.6 billion.
news_page.news_4_title: Development of Generative AI IP Supervisory Supporter Tool Begins
news_page.news_4_summary: Development of an IP supervisory support tool utilizing generative AI has begun.
news_page.news_5_summary: The vacant house revitalization project 'ANGO Ishigaki' has been released in the Ishigaki area.

privacy.intro: RECIKA Co., Ltd. (hereinafter referred to as 'the Company') complies with laws and regulations regarding the protection of personal information and handles your personal information appropriately in accordance with the following privacy policy.
privacy.section1_text: The Company may collect personal information such as your name, email address, phone number, and company name through contact forms, service registration, event applications, and other means.
privacy.section2_text:
The Company uses collected personal information for the following purposes:
- Responding to inquiries
- Providing and operating services
- Providing information about new services and updates
- Statistical analysis for service improvement and development
- Compliance with laws and regulations
privacy.section3_text:
The Company will not provide personal information to third parties without your consent, except as required by law. However, the following cases are excluded:
- When required by law
- When necessary for the protection of life, body, or property
- When particularly necessary for improving public health or promoting the sound development of children
- When cooperation is necessary for a national or local government agency to carry out duties prescribed by law
privacy.section4_text: The Company implements appropriate security measures to prevent leakage, loss, or damage of personal information. We also provide appropriate supervision of employees who handle personal information.
privacy.section5_text: When you request disclosure, correction, or deletion of your personal information, we will respond within a reasonable period after verifying your identity.
privacy.section6_text: Our website may use cookies and similar technologies for service improvement and access analysis. You can refuse cookies through your browser settings, but some services may not function properly.
privacy.section7_text: The Company may change this privacy policy as necessary. The revised privacy policy will take effect when posted on our website.
privacy.section8_text:
For inquiries regarding the handling of personal information, please contact us at:

RECIKA Co., Ltd.
Inspired.Lab, 6F Otemachi Building, 1-6-1 Otemachi, Chiyoda-ku, Tokyo
Email: info@recika.jp
